name: market for nitric oxide | nitric oxide | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/16726/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'nitric oxide', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;nitric oxide'  is an inorganic substance with a CAS no. : 010102-43-9. It is called 'nitrogen monoxide' under IUPAC naming and its molecular formula is: NO. It is gas under normal conditions of temperature and pressure, has the form of compressed gas and is odourless. The substance is modelled as a pure substance.  There is no publicly available information about the consumption of this substance on a consumer level. On industrial sites, the substance is used for the manufacture of products in the following sectors: laboratory chemicals, semiconductors and fuels.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'nitric oxide',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'nitric oxide',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
